isApproved(address).details: This function checks to see if the address is on the oracle's approved list. This is the APPROVED_LIST type.

returns._0: denied returns true if approved, false if not

isDenied(address).details: This function checks to see if the address is on the oracle's denied list. This is the DENIED_LIST type.

returns._0: denied returns true if denied, false if not
